reviewText: Well done, as all these interviews are. Mr. Turner is very charmingly OCD, and gives us a nice inside look at the inner workings of both his mind and the Hollywood machine.

I got this DVD because I knew that Turner has set up tons of projects in the past couple years.  He sells like 5 scripts a year.  It takes me a year to write one script, so I wanted to know how this guy is so productive.  He talks a lot about his writing habits, which I found inspiring.  I didn't always agree with the writer's opinions, but you can see how his confidence must help him sell all his ideas.
